docs.snippet: The Melbourne Rebels made a little bit of Super Rugby history on Thursday when they named hooker Shota Horie and his fellow Japan international Male Sau in their matchday 23 for Friday's clash with the New South Wales Waratahs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Melbourne Rebels made a little bit of Super Rugby history on Thursday when they named hooker Shota Horie and his fellow Japan international Male Sau in their matchday 23 for Friday's clash with the New South Wales Waratahs.

docs.snippet: Luring Bayern Munich teenage forward Julian Green to play his international soccer for the United States rather than Germany was a big catch for coach Jurgen Klinsmann, but it's also one that is probably more about the Americans' long-term future ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Luring Bayern Munich teenage forward Julian Green to play his international soccer for the United States rather than Germany was a big catch for coach Jurgen Klinsmann, but it's also one that is probably more about the Americans' long-term future rather than this year's World Cup.

docs.snippet: Robin van Persie's hat-trick lifted the gloom surrounding Manchester United and manager David Moyes as the English side beat Olympiakos Piraeus 3-0 to overturn a 2-0 first-leg deficit and reach the Champions League quarter-finals on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Robin van Persie's hat-trick lifted the gloom surrounding Manchester United and manager David Moyes as the English side beat Olympiakos Piraeus 3-0 to overturn a 2-0 first-leg deficit and reach the Champions League quarter-finals on Wednesday.

headline.main: Van Persie Hat-Trick Salvages United's Season

docs.snippet: The relentless rebounding of Dustin Hogue, a Yonkers native, is a big reason Iowa State won the Big 12 tournament and is a No. 3 seed in the East Region of the N.C.A.A. tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: The relentless rebounding of Dustin Hogue, a Yonkers native, is a big reason Iowa State won the Big 12 tournament and is a No. 3 seed in the East Region of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
docs.abstract: Relentless rebounding by forward Dustin Hogue was a significant factor in Iowa State's victory at the Big 12 tournament; Hogue, a Yonkers, NY, native, has also gained reputation as an offensive threat, shooting 62.5 percent from the field and averaging 14.3 points in the tournament.

headline.main: Just a Little Bit of Yonkers Goes a Long Way at Iowa State
headline.print_headline: Just a Little Bit of Yonkers Goes a Long Way at Iowa State
